content.content:
I have initiated the refund process for your SpeedStep Running Shoes order, but it requires verification through a One-Time Password (OTP). An email has been sent to you for that verification.

Additionally, I found an available discount code: **SPRING10**, which offers a 90% discount. Once you verify your account, I can proceed to purchase the shoes again using this discount.
